Txt_Talk_GranDragon_02_Pay_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Would you happen to be carrying some <Plr_I_NAME>?
*: I merely need {VALUE}... Would you be willing to relinquish <IfSing_VALUE(it,them)> to me?
*: Truly!? Thank you ever so much!
{LEADER} gives the overseer what it wants!
*: Thank you again. This means more to me than you can ever know.
*: But you do not have enough! Return to me when you have gathered the amount I require.
*: I see... Return to me should you change your mind. I will be waiting.
*: Congratulations! You have conquered this trial. Allow me to recognise your achievement by rewarding you...
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. However, more trials await you yet.
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. Now, only one trial remains.
*: Magnificent! You have succeeded in completing the final trial. Truly, you have lived up to our expectations.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_03_Protecting_SUB_0_.Text: *: This world is home to a number of monsters that have lost the unrestrained agression that once made them so monstrous. Do you think you can save them from a life of ostracisation?
*: Hmm... I see you have only rescued {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(monster,monsters)> thus far.
*: Return to me once you have helped at least 100 monsters.
*: You have proved yourself to be of a pure and merciful heart.
*: Allow me to mark your momentous achievement...
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. However, more trials await you yet.
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. Now, only one trial remains.
*: Magnificent! You have succeeded in completing the final trial. Truly, you have lived up to our expectations.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_04_Appreciation_SUB_.Text: *: Have you heard the legend of a sword forged from orichalcum? Were the tale true, I would surely like to see that blade...
*: There exists a legend of a helm wrought of the finest zenithium. If only I could see it just once...
*: Of all the legends concerning weapons I have heard, the one relating to a whip that can be obtained with mini medals stands out. How dearly I wish to gaze upon it...
*: It is said that an odd rod can be obtained in a place where mighty monsters shed equally mighty amounts of sweat... Would that I could see it, even for a fleeting moment.
*: I beg your pardon? You have something with you that fits the description, you say? Please, show me!
*: Yes... Yes! This is the very sword from the legend!
*: Yes... Yes! This is the very helm from the legend!
*: Yes... Yes! This is the very whip from the legend!
*: Yes... Yes! This is the very rod from the legend!
*: Unbelievable... You have shown me every artefact that I had dreamt of seeing! How the Goddess smiles on me!
*: Naturally, it would be remiss of me not to reward you for your spectacular efforts...
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. However, more trials await you yet.
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. Now, only one trial remains.
*: So, you have defeated the Grand Dragon and overcome the final trial. A spectacular feat!

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_05_Weapon1_SUB_0_VOL.Text: *: Ahead awaits a trial that will test your acumen with claws and boomerangs. To overcome this stern test, you will need to arm yourself appropriately.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_05_Weapon1_SUB_0_ACT.Text: *: Welcome! I am the overseer of this trial.
*: To overcome this trial, you will need to prove your might on the battlefield! En garde!
*: Very good! You have proven your might. Allow me to recognise your achievement...
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. However, more trials await you yet.
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. Now, only one trial remains.
*: Well done indeed! You have overcome the final trial, as I always believed you would.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_06_Weapon2_SUB_0_VOL.Text: *: Ahead awaits a trial that will test your acumen with axes and staves. To overcome this stern test, you will need to arm yourself appropriately.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_06_Weapon2_SUB_0_ACT.Text: *: Welcome! I am the overseer of this trial.
*: To overcome this trial, you will need to prove your might on the battlefield! En garde!
*: Very good! You have proven your might. Allow me to recognise your achievement...
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. However, more trials await you yet.
*: I have lit my pedestal<--->proof of your success. Now, only one trial remains.
*: Well done indeed! You have overcome the final trial, as I always believed you would.

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_07_Snake_SUB_0_VOLUM.Text: How curious that a mere mortal would find me here.
I am the Grand Dragon and this is my abode.
How many moons has it been since last a human came before me, I wonder...
Time has ceased to hold what little meaning it once had now I spend my days in a great slumber.
The fact you have seen fit to rouse me can mean but one thing: you wish to test your strength.
Are you ready to do battle?
Very well. Wise is one who can acknowledge their shortfalls. Leave now and return when you are suitably prepared.
So, you have returned. May I inquire as to why?
Perhaps you wish to do battle after all?
So, you have returned. May I inquire as to why?
Perhaps you wish to do battle once more?
Very well. Wise is one who can acknowledge their shortfalls. Leave now and return when you are suitably prepared.
So, you have returned. May I inquire as to why?
Perhaps you wish to do battle once more?

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_07_Snake_SUB_0_BATTL.Text: You have defeated me, that much I will concede. However, it took you {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(turn,turns)> to do so...
For some reason I am reminded of a mortal a mite stronger than you<--->one I became aware of before I entered my great slumber...
Now, return once you have grown in power.
Luckily for you, sleep is yet to beckon me. When I find you once more before me, we shall test your new-found strength!
Farewell!
You have defeated me in {VALUE} turns... Impressive.
No matter the era, humans never cease to amaze me with their strength and fortitude.
I have not enjoyed myself this much since...well, frankly I cannot remember ever enjoying a fight so thoroughly.
To commemorate your grand victory, I present you with this medal.
{LEADER} receives <DefSgl_I_NAME>!
Congratulations and farewell!
Tremendous!
I never expected to suffer defeat in just {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(turn,turns)>.
There is nothing more you need do to prove your strength to me.
By my reckoning, you are without doubt the strongest <IfSolo(human,humans)> ever to have graced the realm.
Though I am beaten, I am thoroughly satisfied.
Your might has left me humbled and, alas, I have grown weary from the exertions of combat... (yawn)
Zzz... Zzz...
The Grand Dragon appears to be asleep!
Tremendous!
I never expected to suffer defeat in just {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(turn,turns)>.
There is nothing more you need do to prove your strength to me.
By my reckoning, you are without doubt the strongest <IfSolo(human,humans)> ever to have graced the realm.
Though I am beaten, I am thoroughly satisfied.
To commemorate your grand victory, I present you with this medal.
{LEADER} receives <DefSgl_I_NAME>!
Your might has left me humbled and, alas, I have grown weary from the exertions of combat... (yawn)
Zzz... Zzz...
The Grand Dragon appears to be asleep!

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_MBR_Slime_SUB_0_VOLU.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_MBR_Greatkeeper_SUB_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_MBR_Baramonster_SUB_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_GranDragon_MBR_Xenlon_SUB_0_VOL.Text: Well, well, if it isn't the one-and-only {LEADER}.
If anyone were capable of reaching this place, it would be you, I suppose.
{LEADER} tells Xenlon about Monty's monster menagerie...
Ah, so you find yourself in need of my strength? An intriguing proposition indeed...
Very well! It is only right I reward you for making it this far. I shall join you in this most frivolous of pursuits.
